attributes.action: organise national IQ tests for every eligible voter and to disqualify those with an IQ less than 100
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I deal with the General public on a daily basis.It is staggering as to the vast differences in aptitude and intelligence evidentin our society.I feel that it is totally inappropiate that people who are evidently lacking in basic common sense should have an equal vote to someone of greater intelligence
